Dialogue.Page: Mod: Celestial Orrery Authors: Mikel Salazar
Celestial Orrery is a mod made for the first Outer Wilds Mod Jam. Despite jam requirements, this was not a story mod.
This mod places the planets of the Solar System onto an enlarged version of the orrery at the Timber Hearth Observatory.
Aside for the decoration, the mod aims to be a visual guide for players, helping them better orient themselves in spaceflight.
